location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '43'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Street scene in Ahwaz [Ahvaz]. High stone walls at right and left extend into the distant background where a number of figures are walking. At far left a man walks towards the camera while at centre a man wearing European-style dress and a child walk alongside a donkey.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: 'Ahwaz'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘43’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(April 1917)’
